    VSB.Boundary — Type.
    Boundary(body_pts,t_hats,n_hats)

    Struct containing boundary information. The user must supply the location of the body points (body_pts), and the tangent and normal vectors of the body at each body point.

    VSB.func — Method.
    func(x)

    Returns double the number x plus 1.
